entry.title: AlienUI-Org/AlienUI: A lightweight open-source UI component library that provides free Nativewind UI components for react native mobile apps.
entry.content: A lightweight open-source UI component library that provides free Nativewind UI components for react native mobile apps.

entry.title: bukhtyarhaider/HummiGrab: HummGrab is a fast and lightweight YouTube downloader inspired by the speed and efficiency of a hummingbird. It allows users to easily download YouTube videos in various formats and resolutions. Designed for simplicity and performance, HummGrab ensures a smooth and user-friendly experience.
entry.content: HummGrab is a fast and lightweight YouTube downloader inspired by the speed and efficiency of a hummingbird. It allows users to easily download YouTube videos in various formats and resolutions. Designed for simplicity and performance, HummGrab ensures a smooth and user-friendly experience.

entry.title: aeon1n/lynkthat: A lightweight, self-hosted bookmark manager built with Deno + Fresh. Stores your links locally in SQLite with a simple and fast UI for easy management

entry.title: zenokit/zeno: Zeno is a zero-dependency, lightweight web framework for TypeScript, designed for maximum simplicity and flexibility. It provides intuitive file-based routing and makes building APIs and web applications straightforward while ensuring high performance.
entry.content: Zeno is a zero-dependency, lightweight web framework for TypeScript, designed for maximum simplicity and flexibility. It provides intuitive file-based routing and makes building APIs and web applications straightforward while ensuring high performance.

entry.content: Lightweight package for sending messages via the Telegram Bot API

entry.title: AnkanSaha/AxioDB: A fast, lightweight, and scalable open-source DBMS for modern apps. Supports JSON-based data storage, simple APIs, and secure data management. Ideal for projects needing efficient and flexible database solutions.
entry.content: A fast, lightweight, and scalable open-source DBMS for modern apps. Supports JSON-based data storage, simple APIs, and secure data management. Ideal for projects needing efficient and flexible database solutions.

entry.title: watanabe-1/rpc4next: Inspired by Hono RPC and Pathpida, rpc4next brings a lightweight and intuitive RPC solution to Next.js, making server-client communication seamless

entry.title: topghostly/glyph-cms: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀
entry.content: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀

entry.content: Very lightweight Dom manipulation and creation library

entry.title: Nexacore-Org/ByteChain-Academy: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
entry.content: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
